title: Pricing Analyst at Software Solutions (New York, NY)
text: Source: Dice Title Pricing Analyst Duration Long Term Location New York, NY Face to face must after telephonic interview Job Description The Pricing Analyst Role has the responsibility for maintaining prices for all products across multiple clientrsquos Investment Management Divisions. The role involves working with portfolio managers, traders and pricing vendors to ensure all products are valued accurately. Manage prices for all products in all clientrsquos Investment Management divisions. Update the most difficult to price securities for monthly customer statements. Analyze exception reports detailing price discrepancies and variances over a defined tolerance. Communicate with internal business groups on concerns, new products, and inquiries. Communicate with internal and external pricing sources for price verification. Utilize multiple sources to verify, modify and investigate pricing discrepancies. Knowledge of a broad spectrum of security types including Municipals, Government issues, Equities, Options, Derivatives and Alternative Investments. Thanks Regards, Nikhil Bansal Software Solutions Inc. Email nikhil()softsolint(.)com - please ignore () Ph 732-743-8509 clients Investment Management, price securities, detailing price discrepancies
